body:
Hello people of avicus,

    I am on the quest to find the best free (or torrented)  video editing program out there! I have just recently gotten back into youtube uploading. I use fraps so the video splits at 4GB and i need a program to put them back together again. Please reply if you are 100% satisfied with your software.

replies.body: You can join them with windows media player...
replies.body_tagged: You can join them with windows media player...

replies.body: Well you see, the problem with Windows media player is that once u make the video,  it turns it into a weird file that YouTube won't accept. And then you have to go through another step that takes a long time.

replies.body: ummm... what are you talking about??? youtube accepts all files... it accepts .wav, .mp4, e.t.c. ... you don't need to take another big step, all you do is put the files in the application, you mash it up or whatever you need to do and render it in 1080p or 720p... its that easy
